channel.title: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers
channel.description: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers U.S. Representative, Washington, Fifth District (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: Good evening.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: While we gather here tonight for the second night of the GOP Convention in Tampa, we'd like to pause to acknowledge those along the Gulf Coast impacted by Hurricane Isaac.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: While it's now been downgraded to a tropical storm, our hearts and our prayers remain with them.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: And we pledge to help them recover and rebuild.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: To find out more about how you can help those affected by Hurricane Isaac, please visit: www.RedCross.Org\give.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: Tonight we have a terrific line-up for you. Our theme tonight is, "We can change it."
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: We have heard of the challenges America is facing; now let's talk about the solutions.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: Those of you here in the convention, and those of you watching at home, know what needs to be done:
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: --We need to create more jobs and get our economy moving again.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: --We need to make college affordable and within the reach of every child. I was the first in my family to graduate from college, so I know how important that is to the American Dream.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: --We need a government that works for us, not against us, and lives within its means (just like you and I do).
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: --We also need a president who shares these ideas and values. Our current president has a different philosophy.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: For every problem, he has the same solution: more taxes, more spending and more government.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: We know how those policies have turned out: more unemployment, more poverty, and more debt.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: Friends, we know we can do better ­ we can change it. And tonight's program is filled with people who will tell us how.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: Senator John Thune will talk to us about how small businesses ­ like the one I ran with my family in Washington state ­ are the fuel our economy needs.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: Senator Rob Portman will talk to us about the vital role of international trade in jump-starting our economy.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: Governor Tim Pawlenty will share with us why he believes Mitt Romney is the man who can get the job done.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: We're so pleased that Mike Huckabee will be with us. We look forward to hearing his candid assessments as one of America's favorite former governors.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: And former Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice will talk about America's role on the world stage ­ and how our current economic situation impacts our ability to lead.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: New Mexico Governor Susana Martinez will talk about how she became the first female Hispanic governor in American history ­ and how she hopes to break down barriers for other young women.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: And finally, our keynote speaker is a man with the courage of his convictions, who is not afraid to tackle the tough questions facing our country, the next vice president of the United States, Paul Ryan.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers

item.title: So let's start by talking about one of the first things that will change under Mitt Romney ­ Obamacare. Join me in welcoming Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi and Georgia Attorney General Sam Olens.
item.author: The Hon. Cathy McMorris Rodgers
